name: Naurú
description:
Welcome to Naurú! 

This is a game about Curupira, the legendary Brazilian folkloric figure. 
Trying to fulfill his legacy, Curupira hopes to preserve and honor his motherland, the beautiful Amazon Rainforest from the evil intentions of the mercenaries who wish to capitalize on the most amazing place in the entire world.

Can you save the day and honor your status as Naurú, the great hero?

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys for Movement
  • Space Bar (hold) for Whistle (you need to be close to the enemy) 
  • Z for Trap

Game Mechanics:

  • The Whistle make the enemy turn in the opposite direction. Make sure that the 5 seconds cooldown is over before using!
  • The trap is the way for stopping the mercenaries! Make surge the 7 second cooldown is over before using. And be careful! If you go over the trap, it cancels it and you need to wait another cooldown to use it again.
